cast.name: 迈尔斯·哈姆帕斯 Myles Humphus

director.name: 凯瑟琳·毕格罗 Kathryn Bigelow

this_title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro: Hollywood in Your Pocket
introduction: iPhone 13 Pro. The biggest camera upgrade to iPhone ever. Featuring all new Cinematic mode that lets you shift focus from the foreground to the background, 3x optical zoom, advanced low-light performance, macro video, advanced stabilization, and it shoots in ProRes. It's Hollywood in your pocket.
chinese_title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro: Hollywood in Your Pocket
